title: These are the best deals on Appleâ€™s powerful new Mac Studio
content:
Apple has officially announced the Mac Studio, and it’s a beast. The base model comes with the firm’s M1 Max processor, but it can be configured with the all-new M1 Ultra. The chip uses a new process that Apple calls UltraFusion to basically glue two M1 Max processors together. The result is performance that seems

The post These are the best deals on Apple’s powerful new Mac Studio appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple's new Mac Studio is powerful, but it's also expensive. We're rounding up the best deals that you can get on the new desktop PC.
